name: Headache
description:
Headache is a hardcore minimalistic first person shooter. Plunge into the world of suffer and paranoia. The whole game world consists of the patterns of red colour. A huge number of the most terrible monsters, a limited weapon arsenal and an original graphic style won’t let you get bored!
Can you get rid of this headache?Game features
  • a minimalistic old-school style
  • an ambiance of horror and fear
  • a real hardcore
